Sources: Somali authorities; and IMF Staff estimates.
1/ Unconsolidated basis. Aggregates the fiscal accounts of the Federal Government of Somalia, Puntland, Galmudug, Hirshabelle, South West, and Jubaland. The numbers are based
on preliminary reports from FMS and are subject to revision. The fiscal operations are recorded on a cash basis.
2/ Reporting on these categories commenced in 2020 reporting.
3/ Transfer from FGS to Banadir region is not included.
4/ Advances and transfers to MDAs are not included.
